questions.question: Brian Lara holds the record for the highest individual score in Test cricket with 400 not out.
Sachin Tendulkar has scored more than 100 international centuries.
The highest ODI individual score is over 300 runs.
Don Bradman's Test batting average is exactly 99.94.
Chris Gayle holds the record for most sixes in international cricket.
Rohit Sharma has scored 3 double centuries in ODI cricket.
The fastest Test century was scored in under 30 balls.
Allan Border holds the record for most Test runs by an Australian.
Virat Kohli has the most runs in T20 International cricket.
The record for most runs in a single over is 36 runs.
